# load data
```{r}
data = read.csv2("data/json/2021-10-19/0daa.csv")
tag = "0daa"
```

![](/Users/shengchen/Documents/R/Test/data/json/2021-10-19/Wire 2021-10-19 at 11-48-06.jpg)


# test 1
![](/Users/shengchen/Documents/R/Test/data/json/2021-10-19/Wire 2021-10-19 at 17_34.png)

## contre le corps
```{r}
dat = data %>%
  filter(H==11 & M>=28 & M>=30)

q <- p + 
  geom_point(data = dat, aes(x=x,y=y), col = "red", size=0.5) +
  coord_fixed(ratio = 1, xlim = c(-35,10), ylim = c(-65,10)) + 
  labs(x="", y="", title = "0daa: 11H28 - 11H30")
print(q)
```

## dans le poche
```{r}
dat = data %>%
  filter(H==11 & M>=35 & M>=37)

q <- p + 
  geom_point(data = dat, aes(x=x,y=y), col = "red", size=0.5) +
  coord_fixed(ratio = 1, xlim = c(-35,10), ylim = c(-65,10)) + 
  labs(x="", y="", title = "0daa: 11H35 - 11H37")
print(q)
```

## dessus de la tête
